message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer, but $180 is a bit too high for me.  Would you be willing to come down to $80?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $110?
I appreciate you coming down on the price, Alice.  How about we split the difference and do $95?
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $95, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. How about we do $105?
